SageTVPlugin.Name: Name Timed Recording General
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda
SageTVPlugin.Description: Support Plugin for Named Timed Recording. No need to install this directly.
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
-Move to V9 repository
Version 1.36:
- Moved hosting to BinTray. No change in functionality.
Version 1.30:
- Fixed bug that would occur if two timed recordings with the same recurrence happened on the same channel.
- Added ability to edit the names of existing timed recordings and manual recordings.
- Improved dialog that displays suggested names.
- Added logging.
- Known Issue: Will not work properly for languages other than English.
Version 1.25:
- Added support so STV can check if plugin is installed on the server.
Version 1.20:
- Enhanced method used to set metadata for recurring timed recording.
- Changed status to beta so it's the same as the STVi portion of the plugin.
Version 1.10:
- First release.
